mapper.select: select m.id,c.boss,c.account,c.company_name,m.material_name,count(m.id) num from tb_company c left join tb_material_relation mr on mr.company_id = c.id left join tb_material m on m.id = mr.material_id where c.id =#{userid} and mr.data_type=0 group by m.id limit #{start},#{pageSize}
